sentences.en: Connect me with the Foreign Languages Department, please.
Connect the gas stove with the gas pipe.
sentences.cn: 将煤气炉和煤气管接起来.

sentences.en: I cannot connect the two things in my mind.
sentences.cn: 在我心中,我无法将这两件事情联系在一起.

sentences.en: I didn’t connect the two events in my mind.
sentences.cn: 我心里没把这两件事联系起来。

sentences.en: If you stand on stage and share your view of the world, people will connect with you.
sentences.cn: 如果你站在舞台上，分享自己对世界的看法，人们会与你产生共鸣的。

sentences.en: Northbound and eastbound trains connect at New York.
sentences.cn: 北上和东行的列车在纽约衔接.

sentences.en: One moment, please. I'll see if I can connect you again.
sentences.cn: 请等一会儿, 看我能不能再给你接通.

sentences.en: The fallopian tubes connect the ovaries with the uterus.
sentences.cn: 输卵管连接着卵巢和子宫。

sentences.en: The traditional method is to enter the exchanges at night and connect the wires.
sentences.cn: 传统的办法是晚上进入电话局，把线连上。

sentences.en: The two parts do not connect properly.
The wires connect under the floor.
sentences.cn: 电线是在地板下接通的.

sentences.en: This sentence does not seem to connect with the context.
sentences.cn: 这个句子似乎与上下文脱节.

sentences.en: Two cables connect to each corner of the plate.
sentences.cn: 两条电缆连到金属板的每个角上。

sentences.en: We’d like two rooms with connecting doors (= doors that join the rooms ) .
sentences.cn: 我们想要两个有门相通的房间。

sentences.en: Where do the two railroads connect [ link up ]?
sentences.cn: 两条铁路在 何处 连接?

sentences.en: You can connect the machine to your hi-fi.
sentences.cn: 你可以把机器连在高保真音响上。

sentences.en: You must connect this wire with that one.
sentences.cn: 你必须把这条电线和那条接起来.

words.tran_cn: [计] 连接的；有联系的；连贯的

trans.tran_cn: (使)连接/接通，把…联系起来，联运，(使)换乘，产生共鸣
trans.tran_en: to join two or more things together

trans.tran_cn: 连接， 结合， 联系； 给…接通电话
trans.tran_en: to join two or more things together
